BSG1-056.subtitle: Accused
BSG1-056.abilityText: Target personnel gains the Cylon trait until end of turn.
BSG1-056.flavorText: "It's not true. It's not true. It's not. I'm not. I'm not...." —Lt. Valerii

BSG1-058.subtitle: Arrow Of Apollo
BSG1-058.abilityText: Search your deck for a card and then put that card into your hand.
BSG1-058.flavorText: "It's supposed to be the only clue as to the location of Earth." —Lt. Valerii

BSG1-059.subtitle: Article 23
BSG1-059.abilityText: Each player chooses one—Sacrifice one personnel; or lose 2 influence.

BSG1-061.subtitle: CAG
BSG1-061.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) All ships you control get +1 power.
BSG1-061.flavorText: "You can keep your day job as the C-A-G." —President Roslin "It's pronounced CAG." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-063.subtitle: Combat Air Patrol
BSG1-063.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Commit target Pilot you control. Gain 1 influence.

BSG1-064.subtitle: Difference Of Opinion
BSG1-064.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Players can't challenge you unless they pay 1 resource for each challenge. (This cost can be paid using any resource.)

BSG1-065.subtitle: Dradis Contact
BSG1-065.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Each time you play an event, you may gain 1 influence.

BSG1-066.subtitle: Earn Freedom Points
BSG1-066.abilityText: Gain 1 influence for each Civilian unit or Civilian mission you control.
BSG1-066.flavorText: "We're offering you a chance for a new beginning. Whoever is interested, step out of your cells." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-068.subtitle: Flight School
BSG1-068.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) When a ship you control would be defeated, you may sacrifice this mission instead.

BSG1-069.subtitle: Formal Dress Function
BSG1-069.flavorText: "Attention. President of the Colonies. Arriving." —Lt. Gaeta

BSG1-070.subtitle: Full Scale Assault
BSG1-070.abilityText: All units you control get +1 power.

BSG1-071.subtitle: God Has A Plan
BSG1-071.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission in your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Each time you reveal a Cylon card for mystic value, that card gets +1 to its mystic value.

BSG1-072.subtitle: Green: You're A Normal Human
BSG1-072.abilityText: Put target Cylon unit into its owner's hand. That player gains 2 influence.
BSG1-072.flavorText: "Good news. It's green. You're not a Cylon. Congratulations." —Dr. Baltar

BSG1-073.subtitle: Hand Of God
BSG1-073.flavorText: "You are part of God's plan, Gaius." —Number Six

BSG1-074.subtitle: Hunt For Tylium
BSG1-074.abilityText: Put a supply card into play in your resource area from your hand.
BSG1-074.flavorText: "Jackpot, Boomer! Dead ahead. That asteroid is a mountain of tylium." —Lt. Quartararo

BSG1-075.subtitle: Increased Loadout
BSG1-075.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) All Fighters get +1 power.

BSG1-076.subtitle: Interim Quorum Of Twelve
BSG1-076.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Commit and exhaust target Politician you control: Target other personnel gets +3 power.

BSG1-077.subtitle: Investigation
BSG1-077.abilityText: Put target personnel on top of its owner's deck. That player loses 2 influence.
BSG1-077.flavorText: "As you can see, the man in the photo is carrying an explosive device." —Shelley Godfrey

BSG1-078.subtitle: Kobol's Last Gleaming
BSG1-078.abilityText: Shuffle target personnel into its owner's deck.

BSG1-079.subtitle: Life Has A Melody
BSG1-079.resolveText: Resolve: 1 Civilian unit and 1 Cylon unit.
BSG1-079.abilityText: Search your deck for a Cylon card, reveal it to your opponents, and put it into your hand.
BSG1-079.flavorText: "It's time for you to play your part and realize your destiny." —Number Six

BSG1-080.subtitle: Meet The New Boss
BSG1-080.abilityText: Exchange target personnel card in your hand with target personnel you control that has the same power.

BSG1-081.subtitle: Misdirection
BSG1-081.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) When a personnel you control would be defeated, you may sacrifice this mission instead.

BSG1-082.subtitle: Multiple Contacts
BSG1-082.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Each time the ready phase begins, draw a card.

BSG1-083.subtitle: Obliterate The Base
BSG1-083.abilityText: Defeat target asset that has no supply cards.
BSG1-083.flavorText: "We'll mop them up, then grab the tylium." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-084.subtitle: Overtime
BSG1-084.flavorText: "Show's over. We got work to do." —CPO Tyrol

BSG1-085.subtitle: Persistent Assault
BSG1-085.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) The fleet defense level gets -2.

BSG1-086.subtitle: Picking Sides
BSG1-086.abilityText: Choose a singular personnel you control. All other players sacrifice any personnel that has the same title.

BSG1-087.subtitle: Press Junket
BSG1-087.flavorText: "Good evening. The investigation into the suicide bombing aboard Galactica and how it was allowed to occur has come to a close...." —President Roslin

BSG1-088.subtitle: Pulling Rank
BSG1-088.flavorText: "This is a military decision, Madame President. Thank you for your concern." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-089.subtitle: Red: You're An Evil Cylon
BSG1-089.abilityText: Put target Cylon unit into its owner's hand. That player loses 2 influence.
BSG1-089.flavorText: "Congratulations, Doctor. You've just uncovered your very first Cylon." —Number Six

BSG1-090.subtitle: Refueling Operation
BSG1-090.abilityText: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.
BSG1-090.flavorText: "Tell Doctor Baltar he was right on the money. It's a hell of a fireworks show." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-091.subtitle: Relieved Of Duty
BSG1-091.abilityText: Put target alert personnel into its owner's hand.
BSG1-091.flavorText: "We're not quitting and you're relieved, Colonel." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-092.subtitle: Shuttle Diplomacy
BSG1-092.flavorText: "Clearly, the Cylons were trying to discredit Doctor Baltar because of his work on the Cylon detector." —President Roslin

BSG1-093.subtitle: Stern Leadership
BSG1-093.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) All Pilots get +1 power.

BSG1-094.subtitle: Suspicions
BSG1-094.flavorText: "I was worried she might be a Cylon! I even brought back a blood sample for Baltar to test!" —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-095.subtitle: Trying Times
BSG1-095.abilityText: Gain 1 influence for each alert Politician in play.
BSG1-095.flavorText: "I need to make an appeal to the people...." —President Roslin

BSG1-096.subtitle: We'll See You Again
BSG1-096.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your reserve area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Cylon units you control aren't singular. (You don't play them to unit stacks.)

BSG1-097.subtitle: Working Together
BSG1-097.flavorText: "Politics. Almost as exciting as war. Certainly as dangerous." —Cmdr. Adama "In war you can only be killed once. In politics, many times." —President Roslin

BSG2-056.subtitle: Cylon Betrayal
BSG2-056.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Sacrifice: Target player goes first in the next Cylon phase this turn.

BSG2-057.subtitle: Damning Evidence
BSG2-057.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Cylon units with the Machine trait can't be used to resolve this mission. This personnel can't challenge. (This personnel can defend.)

BSG2-058.subtitle: Deck Crew
BSG2-058.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This ship gets +1 power.

BSG2-059.subtitle: Drawing Strength From Loss
BSG2-059.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Each time a personnel you control is defeated by a Cylon threat, gain 2 influence.

BSG2-060.subtitle: Explosive Rounds
BSG2-060.abilityText: Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) During the Cylon phase, this unit gets +2 power.

BSG2-061.subtitle: False Peace
BSG2-061.resolveText: Resolve: 1 Cylon personnel and 1 Cylon ship.
BSG2-061.abilityText: The execution phase ends. After the Cylon phase, there is an additional execution phase, and then an additional Cylon phase.

BSG2-062.subtitle: Hero To The End
BSG2-062.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) When this personnel leaves play, its controller gains 2 influence.

BSG2-063.subtitle: In Love With A Machine
BSG2-063.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this personnel: Ready target Cylon unit.

BSG2-064.subtitle: Independent Tribunal
BSG2-064.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Units with power 2 or less can't defend against this personnel.

BSG2-065.subtitle: Instant Acclaim
BSG2-065.abilityText: Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This unit gets +1 power.

BSG2-066.subtitle: Last Word
BSG2-066.abilityText: Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) When this unit defeats a challenger, gain influence equal to the difference between their power.

BSG2-067.subtitle: Marine Assault
BSG2-067.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This ship gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

BSG2-068.subtitle: Mysterious Warning
BSG2-068.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) During the Cylon phase, this personnel gets +2 power.

BSG2-069.subtitle: Nothin' But The Rain
BSG2-069.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Each time this personnel defeats a Cylon threat, gain 1 additional influence.

BSG2-070.subtitle: Plan B
BSG2-070.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this personnel: Ready target mission.

BSG2-071.subtitle: Prophetic Visions
BSG2-071.abilityText: Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this unit: Look at the top two cards of target player's deck. Put one on top of the deck and the other on the bottom.

BSG2-072.subtitle: Raider Swarm
BSG2-072.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This ship can't challenge. (This ship can defend.)

BSG2-073.subtitle: Ram The Ship
BSG2-073.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) All ships you control gain Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

BSG2-074.subtitle: Rudimentary Still
BSG2-074.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this personnel: Take an extra action after this one. Exhaust target resource stack you control. On your next action, reduce the cost of playing a card by one of any resource.

BSG2-075.subtitle: Sam Battery
BSG2-075.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) All personnel you control gain Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

BSG2-076.subtitle: Teamwork
BSG2-076.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) During the Cylon phase, this ship gets +2 power.

BSG2-077.subtitle: The Hunters
BSG2-077.abilityText: Defeat target mission with the Link keyword.
BSG2-077.flavorText: "We'll get them in the end." —Number Six

BSG2-078.subtitle: Thinking Outside The Box
BSG2-078.abilityText: Defeat target asset that has no supply cards.
BSG2-078.flavorText: "Inform Apollo that the back door is open." —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-079.subtitle: Tightening The Noose
BSG2-079.abilityText: Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.) Each time a player draws a card in the execution phase, he or she discards a card.

BSG2-080.subtitle: To Your Ships
BSG2-080.abilityText: Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) This personnel gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

BSG2-081.subtitle: Trust The Lords Of Kobol
BSG2-081.abilityText: Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this unit: The next time you would reveal a mystic value for a challenge this turn, don't. Target unit gets +X power instead, where X is this unit's mystic value.

BSG2-082.subtitle: Viral Warfare
BSG2-082.abilityText: Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.) Commit this ship: Target player discards a card.

BSG2-045.subtitle: Are You Alive?
BSG2-045.abilityText:
Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

Commit this personnel: Target unit gets -2 power.

BSG2-046.subtitle: Assassination
BSG2-046.abilityText:
Cylon units with the Machine trait can't be used to resolve this mission.

Commit and exhaust target personnel you control: Defeat target personnel.

BSG2-047.subtitle: Beyond Insane
BSG2-047.abilityText:
Link Ship (When resolved, attach to target ship. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

When a personnel you control would be defeated, you can sacrifice this ship instead.

BSG2-048.subtitle: Blackmail
BSG2-048.abilityText:
Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

This personnel gains Manipulate.

BSG2-049.subtitle: Caprican Ideals
BSG2-049.abilityText:
Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.)

All Civilian units get +1 power.

BSG2-050.subtitle: Caprican Supplies
BSG2-050.abilityText:
Link Personnel (When resolved, attach to target personnel. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

This personnel gets +1 power.

BSG2-051.subtitle: Clear Your Heads
BSG2-051.abilityText:
Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

Commit this unit: Exhaust target mission.

BSG2-052.subtitle: Coming Out To Fight
BSG2-052.abilityText:
Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.)

The fleet defense level gets +4.

BSG2-053.subtitle: Critical Component
BSG2-053.abilityText:
Persistent.

Exhaust: Take an extra action after this one. Exhaust target resource stack you control that has at least one supply card. On your next action, reduce the cost of playing a card by two of any one resource.

BSG2-054.subtitle: Cutting Through The Hull
BSG2-054.abilityText:
Link Unit (When resolved, attach to target unit. When the target leaves play, put this mission into its owner's discard pile.)

This unit gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

BSG2-055.subtitle: Cylon Ambush
BSG2-055.abilityText:
Persistent (Put this mission into your resource area instead of your discard pile as part of its resolution.)

All Cylon threats get +1 power.
